roleset.name: unyieldingly insistent

example.name: adamant-j: both args
example.text: I 'm leaving Feingold out because he 's been so adamant about not running , but you could mark him as Other , I suppose .

example.name: adamant-j: both args
example.text: He was adamant that he not be afforded any "special" privileges.
example.arg: that he not be afforded any "special" privileges.

roleset.note: ADAMANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from adamant.01-j)
